title: Chickpea-Cucumber Salad
description: A refreshing chickpea and cucumber salad with parsley, lemon juice, and olive oil â€” fast, bright, and great with shish taouk.
ingredients: 1 can (540 mL) chickpeas, drained and rinsed
instructions: Add chickpeas, cucumber, parsley, and green onions to a large bowl.
Whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, salt, pepper, and garlic powder.
Pour dressing over the salad and toss to combine.
Let rest 5 minutes to allow flavors to meld.
notes: Add 1/2 cup diced bell pepper or 1/4 cup edamame for extra crunch and protein.
